31struct vec2
32{
33 union
34 {
35 struct
36 {
37 float x, y;
38 };
39 float v[2];
40 };
41
42 vec2() {}
43 vec2(float x, float y) : x(x), y(y) {}
44 explicit vec2(const vec &v);
45 explicit vec2(const vec4<float> &v);
46
47 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
48 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
49
50 bool operator==(const vec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
51 bool operator!=(const vec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
52
53 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
54 float dot(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
55 float squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
56 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
57 vec2 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
58 vec2 &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
59 float cross(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
60 float squaredist(const vec2 &e) const { return vec2(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
61 float dist(const vec2 &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
62
63 vec2 &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; }
64 vec2 &mul(const vec2 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; return *this; }
65 vec2 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
66 vec2 &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; }
67 vec2 &div(const vec2 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; return *this; }
68 vec2 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; return *this; }
69 vec2 &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; }
70 vec2 &add(const vec2 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; return *this; }
71 vec2 &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; }
72 vec2 &sub(const vec2 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; return *this; }
73 vec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
74 vec2 &min(const vec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
75 vec2 &max(const vec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
76 vec2 &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); return *this; }
77 vec2 &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); return *this; }
78 vec2 &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); return *this; }
79 vec2 &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); return *this; }
80 vec2 &reflect(const vec2 &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; return *this; }
81 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; return *this; }
82 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &a, const vec2 &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; return *this; }
83 vec2 &avg(const vec2 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
84
85 vec2 operator+(const vec2 &v2) const
86 {
87 return vec2(x+v2.x, y+v2.y);
88 }
89
90 vec2 operator-(const vec2 &v2) const
91 {
92 return vec2(x-v2.x, y-v2.y);
93 }
94
95 vec2 operator-() const
96 {
97 return vec2(-x, -y);
98 }

124

126 vec2 &msub(const vec2 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec2(a).mul(b)); }

128 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
129 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
130 vec2 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }

133inline bool htcmp(const vec2 &x, const vec2 &y)
134{
135 return x == y;
136}
137
138inline uint hthash(const vec2 &k)
139{
140 union
141 {
142 uint i;
143 float f;
144 } x, y;
145 x.f = k.x;
146 y.f = k.y;
147 uint v = x.i^y.i;
148 return v + (v>>12);
149}

160struct vec
161{
162 union
163 {
164 struct
165 {
166 float x, y, z;
167 };
168 struct
169 {
170 float r, g, b;
171 };
172 float v[3];
173 };

178 vec(float a, float b, float c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}

186 vec(float yaw, float pitch) : x(-std::sin(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), y(cosf(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), z(std::sin(pitch)) {}
187 vec &set(int i, float f) { v[i] = f; return *this; }

233 //unary operators
234 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
235 float squaredlen() const { return x*x + y*y + z*z; }
236 vec &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
237 vec &neg2() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; } //unused
238 vec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; } //overloaded by operator-()
239 vec &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); z = fabs(z); return *this; }
240 vec &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; return *this; } //used twice
241 float magnitude2() const { return sqrtf(dot2(*this)); }
242 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
243 vec &normalize() { div(magnitude()); return *this; }
244 vec &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) div(m); return *this; }
245 bool isnormalized() const { float m = squaredlen(); return (m>0.99f && m<1.01f); }
246
247 //elementwise float operators
248 vec &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
249 vec &mul2(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; } //unused
250 vec &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
251 vec &div2(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; } //unused
252 vec &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
253 vec &add2(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; } //used once
254 vec &addz(float f) { z += f; return *this; } //unused
255 vec &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
256 vec &sub2(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; } //unused
257 vec &subz(float f) { z -= f; return *this; } //unused
258 vec &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); z = ::min(z, f); return *this; }
259 vec &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); z = ::max(z, f); return *this; }
260 vec &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }

265 vec &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
266 vec &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
267 vec &min(const vec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
268 vec &max(const vec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
269
270 //dot products
271 float dot2(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
272 float dot2(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
273 float dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
274 float squaredot(const vec &o) const { float k = dot(o); return k*k; } //unused
275 float absdot(const vec &o) const { return fabs(x*o.x) + fabs(y*o.y) + fabs(z*o.z); } //used once
276 float zdot(const vec &o) const { return z*o.z; } //unused
277
278 //distances
279 float squaredist(const vec &e) const { return vec(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
280 float dist(const vec &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
281 float dist(const vec &e, vec &t) const { t = *this; t.sub(e); return t.magnitude(); }
282 float dist2(const vec &o) const { float dx = x-o.x, dy = y-o.y; return sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy); }
283
284 //cross products
285 template<class T>
286 bool reject(const T &o, float r) const { return x>o.x+r || x<o.x-r || y>o.y+r || y<o.y-r; }
287
288 template<class A, class B>
289 vec &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
290
291 vec &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
292
296 float scalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return x*(a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y) + y*(a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z) + z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); }
297 float zscalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); } //unused
298
299 //transformations
300 vec &reflectz(float rz) { z = 2*rz - z; return *this; }
301 vec &reflect(const vec &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
302 vec &project(const vec &n) { float k = dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
303 vec &projectxydir(const vec &n) { if(n.z) z = -(x*n.x/n.z + y*n.y/n.z); return *this; } //used once
304 vec &projectxy(const vec &n)
305 {
306 float m = squaredlen(), k = dot(n);
307 projectxydir(n);
308 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
309 return *this;
310 } //used once
311 vec &projectxy(const vec &n, float threshold)
312 {
313 float m = squaredlen(), k = ::min(dot(n), threshold);
314 projectxydir(n);
315 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
316 return *this;
317 } //used once
318 vec &lerp(const vec &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; z += (b.z-z)*t; return *this; }
319 vec &lerp(const vec &a, const vec &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; z = a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t; return *this; }
320 vec &avg(const vec &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }

322 template<class B>
323 vec &madd(const vec &a, const B &b) { return add(vec(a).mul(b)); }
324
325 template<class B>
326 vec &msub(const vec &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec(a).mul(b)); }

328 vec &rescale(float k)
329 {
330 float mag = magnitude();
331 if(mag > 1e-6f) mul(k / mag);
332 return *this;
333 }
334
335 vec &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
336 vec &rotate_around_x(float c, float s) { float ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
337 vec &rotate_around_y(float c, float s) { float rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx+s*rz; z = c*rz-s*rx; return *this; }
338
339 vec &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
340 vec &rotate_around_x(float angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
341 vec &rotate_around_y(float angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
342
343 vec &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
344 vec &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
345 vec &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
346
347 vec &rotate(float c, float s, const vec &d)
348 {
349 *this = vec(x*(d.x*d.x*(1-c)+c) + y*(d.x*d.y*(1-c)-d.z*s) + z*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)+d.y*s),
350 x*(d.y*d.x*(1-c)+d.z*s) + y*(d.y*d.y*(1-c)+c) + z*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)-d.x*s),
351 x*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)-d.y*s) + y*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)+d.x*s) + z*(d.z*d.z*(1-c)+c));
352 return *this;
353 }
354 vec &rotate(float angle, const vec &d) { return rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d); }
355 vec &rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &d) { return rotate(sc.x, sc.y, d); }
356
357 void orthogonal(const vec &d)
358 {
359 *this = fabs(d.x) > fabs(d.z) ? vec(-d.y, d.x, 0) : vec(0, -d.z, d.y);
360 }
361
362 void orthonormalize(vec &s, vec &t) const
363 {
364 s.project(*this);
365 t.project(*this).project(s);
366 } //unused
367
368 template<class T>
369 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax) const
370 {
371 return x >= bbmin.x && x <= bbmax.x && y >= bbmin.y && y <= bbmax.y && z >= bbmin.z && z <= bbmax.z;
372 }
373
374 template<class T, class U>
375 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax, U margin) const
376 {
377 return x >= bbmin.x-margin && x <= bbmax.x+margin && y >= bbmin.y-margin && y <= bbmax.y+margin && z >= bbmin.z-margin && z <= bbmax.z+margin;
378 }
379
380 template<class T, class U>
381 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size) const
382 {
383 return x >= o.x && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z && z <= o.z + size;
384 }
385
386 template<class T, class U>
387 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size, U margin) const
388 {
389 size += margin;
390 return x >= o.x-margin && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y-margin && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z-margin && z <= o.z + size;
391 }
392
393 template<class T>
394 float dist_to_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
395 {
396 float sqrdist = 0;
397 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
398 {
399 if (v[i] < min[i])
400 {
401 float delta = v[i]-min[i];
402 sqrdist += delta*delta;
403 }
404 else if(v[i] > max[i])
405 {
406 float delta = max[i]-v[i];
407 sqrdist += delta*delta;
408 }
409 }
410 return sqrtf(sqrdist);
411 }
412
413 template<class T, class S>
414 float dist_to_bb(const T &o, S size) const
415 {
416 return dist_to_bb(o, T(o).add(size));
417 }
418
419 template<class T>
420 float project_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
421 {
422 return x*(x < 0 ? max.x : min.x) + y*(y < 0 ? max.y : min.y) + z*(z < 0 ? max.z : min.z);
423 }
424
425 static vec hexcolor(int color)
426 {
427 return vec(((color>>16)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), ((color>>8)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), (color&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f));
428 }
429
430 int tohexcolor() const
431 {
432 return (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(r, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<16) |
433 (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(g, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<8) |
434 static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(b, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255);
435 }
436};

438inline vec2::vec2(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
439
440inline bool htcmp(const vec &x, const vec &y)
441{
442 return x == y;
443}
444
445inline uint hthash(const vec &k)
446{
447 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
448 x.f = k.x;
449 y.f = k.y;
450 z.f = k.z;
451 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
452 return v + (v>>12);
453}

455
459struct bvec
460{
461 union
462 {
463 struct
464 {
465 uchar x, y, z;
466 };
467 struct
468 {
469 uchar r, g, b;
470 };
471 uchar v[3];
472 };
473
474 bvec() {}
475 bvec(uchar x, uchar y, uchar z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
476 explicit bvec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<uchar>((v.x+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), y(static_cast<uchar>((v.y+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), z(static_cast<uchar>((v.z+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))) {}
477 explicit bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v);
478
479 uchar &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
480 uchar operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
481
482 bool operator==(const bvec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
483 bool operator!=(const bvec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
484
485 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
486
487 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
488
489 bvec &normalize()
490 {
491 vec n(x-127.5f, y-127.5f, z-127.5f);
492 float mag = 127.5f/n.magnitude();
493 x = static_cast<uchar>(n.x*mag+127.5f);
494 y = static_cast<uchar>(n.y*mag+127.5f);
495 z = static_cast<uchar>(n.z*mag+127.5f);
496 return *this;
497 }
498
499 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, float t)
500 {
501 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
502 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
503 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
504 }
505
506 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
507 {
508 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
509 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
510 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
511 }
512
513 void flip()
514 {
515 x ^= 0x80;
516 y ^= 0x80;
517 z ^= 0x80;
518 }
519
520 void scale(int k, int d)
521 {
522 x = static_cast<uchar>((x*k)/d);
523 y = static_cast<uchar>((y*k)/d);
524 z = static_cast<uchar>((z*k)/d);
525 }
526
527 bvec &shl(int n)
528 {
529 x <<= n;
530 y <<= n;
531 z <<= n;
532 return *this;
533 }
534 bvec &shr(int n)
535 {
536 x >>= n;
537 y >>= n;
538 z >>= n;
539 return *this;
540 }
541
542 static bvec fromcolor(const vec &v)
543 {
544 return bvec(static_cast<uchar>(v.x*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.y*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.z*255.0f));
545 }
546
547 vec tocolor() const
548 {
549 return vec(x*(1.0f/255.0f), y*(1.0f/255.0f), z*(1.0f/255.0f));
550 }
551
552 static bvec from565(ushort c)
553 {
554 return bvec((((c>>11)&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6, (((c>>5)&0x3F)*259 + 35) >> 6, ((c&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6);
555 }
556
557 static bvec hexcolor(int color)
558 {
559 return bvec((color>>16)&0xFF, (color>>8)&0xFF, color&0xFF);
560 }
561
562 int tohexcolor() const
563 {
564 return (static_cast<int>(r)<<16)|(static_cast<int>(g)<<8)|static_cast<int>(b);
565 }
566};
567
576template<typename T>
577struct vec4
578{
579 union
580 {
581 struct { T x, y, z, w; };
582 struct { T r, g, b, a; };
583 T v[4];
584 uint mask;
585 };
586
587 vec4() {}
588 explicit vec4(const vec &p, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(p.z), w(w) {}
589 explicit vec4(const vec2 &p, T z = 0, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(z), w(w) {}
590 vec4(T x, T y, T z, T w) : x(x), y(y), z(z), w(w) {}
591 vec4(bvec v, uchar c)
592 {
593 x = v.x;
594 y = v.y;
595 z = v.z;
596 w = c;
597 }
598 vec4(bvec v)
599 {
600 x = v.x;
601 y = v.y;
602 z = v.z;
603 w = 0;
604 }
605
606 explicit vec4(const T *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]), w(v[3]) {}
607
608 template<class U>
609 operator vec4<U>()
610 {
611 return vec4<U>(static_cast<U>(this->x),
612 static_cast<U>(this->y),
613 static_cast<U>(this->z),
614 static_cast<U>(this->w));
615 }
616
617 T &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
618 T operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
619
620 bool operator==(const vec4 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z && w == o.w; }
621 bool operator!=(const vec4 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z || w != o.w; }
622
633 T dot3(const vec4 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
634
645 T dot3(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
646
657 T dot(const vec4 &o) const { return dot3(o) + w*o.w; }
658
668 T dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z + w; }
669
678 T squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
679
688 T magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
689
698 T magnitude3() const { return sqrtf(dot3(*this)); }
699
707 vec4 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
708
716 vec4 &safenormalize() { T m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
717
718 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, float t)
719 {
720 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
721 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
722 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
723 w = a.w;
724 }
725
726 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
727 {
728 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
729 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
730 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
731 w = a.w;
732 }
733
734 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, const vec4<uchar> &c, float ta, float tb, float tc)
735 {
736 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x*ta + b.x*tb + c.x*tc);
737 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y*ta + b.y*tb + c.y*tc);
738 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z*ta + b.z*tb + c.z*tc);
739 w = static_cast<uchar>(a.w*ta + b.w*tb + c.w*tc);
740 }
741
747 void flip() { mask ^= 0x80808080; }
748
749 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &b, T t)
750 {
751 x += (b.x-x)*t;
752 y += (b.y-y)*t;
753 z += (b.z-z)*t;
754 w += (b.w-w)*t;
755 return *this;
756 }
757 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &a, const vec4 &b, T t)
758 {
759 x = a.x+(b.x-a.x)*t;
760 y = a.y+(b.y-a.y)*t;
761 z = a.z+(b.z-a.z)*t;
762 w = a.w+(b.w-a.w)*t;
763 return *this;
764 }
765
777 vec4 &avg(const vec4 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
778
779 template<class B>
780 vec4 &madd(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
781
782 template<class B>
783 vec4 &msub(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
784
795 vec4 &mul3(T f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
796
807 vec4 &mul(T f) { mul3(f); w *= f; return *this; }
808
820 vec4 &mul(const vec4 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; w *= o.w; return *this; }
821
833 vec4 &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
834
843 vec4 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
844
856 vec4 &div3(T f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
857
868 vec4 &div(T f) { div3(f); w /= f; return *this; }
869
880 vec4 &div(const vec4 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; w /= o.w; return *this; }
881
892 vec4 &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
893
902 vec4 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; w = 1/w; return *this; }
903
914 vec4 &add(const vec4 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; w += o.w; return *this; }
915
927 vec4 &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
928
939 vec4 &add3(T f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
940
951 vec4 &add(T f) { add3(f); w += f; return *this; }
952
963 vec4 &addw(T f) { w += f; return *this; }
964
975 vec4 &sub(const vec4 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; w -= o.w; return *this; }
976
987 vec4 &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
988
999 vec4 &sub3(T f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
1000 vec4 &sub(T f) { sub3(f); w -= f; return *this; }
1001 vec4 &subw(T f) { w -= f; return *this; }
1002 vec4 &neg3() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1003 vec4 &neg() { neg3(); w = -w; return *this; }
1004 vec4 &clamp(T l, T h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); w = ::std::clamp(w, l, h); return *this; }
1005
1006
1007 vec4 operator+(const vec4 &v2) const
1008 {
1009 return vec4(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z, w+v2.w);
1010 }
1011
1012 vec4 operator-(const vec4 &v2) const
1013 {
1014 return vec4(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z, w+v2.w);
1015 }
1016
1017 vec4 operator-() const
1018 {
1019 return vec4(-x, -y, -z, -w);
1020 }
1021
1022 template<typename U>
1023 vec4 operator*(const U &n) const
1024 {
1025 return vec4(n*x, n*y, n*z, n*w);
1026 }
1027
1028 vec4 operator*(const vec4 &v2) const
1029 {
1030 return vec4(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z, w*v2.w);
1031 }
1032
1033 template<typename U>
1034 vec4 operator/(const U &n) const
1035 {
1036 return vec4(x/n, y/n, z/n, w/n);
1037 }
1038
1039 vec4 operator/(const vec4 &v2) const
1040 {
1041 return vec4(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z, w/v2.w);
1042 }
1043
1044
1045 template<class A, class B>
1046 vec4 &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1047
1048 vec4 &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
1049
1050 void setxyz(const vec &v) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; }
1051
1052 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T c, T s) { T rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
1053 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T c, T s) { T ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
1054 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T c, T s) { T rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*rx; return *this; }
1055
1056 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1057 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1058 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1059
1060 vec4 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1061 vec4 &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1062 vec4 &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1063
1064 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
1065
1066};
1067inline vec2::vec2(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1068inline vec::vec(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1069

1652
1653/*
1654
1655The engine uses 3 different linear coordinate systems
1656which are oriented around each of the axis dimensions.
1657
1658So any point within the game can be defined by four coordinates: (d, x, y, z)
1659
1660d is the reference axis dimension
1661x is the coordinate of the ROW dimension
1662y is the coordinate of the COL dimension
1663z is the coordinate of the reference dimension (DEPTH)
1664
1665typically, if d is not used, then it is implicitly the Z dimension.
1666ie: d=z => x=x, y=y, z=z
1667
1668*/
1669
1670// DIM: X=0 Y=1 Z=2.
1671const int R[3] = {1, 2, 0};
1672const int C[3] = {2, 0, 1};
1673const int D[3] = {0, 1, 2};
1675struct ivec2;
1676
1677//integer vector3
1678struct ivec
1679{
1680 union
1681 {
1682 struct
1683 {
1684 int x, y, z;
1685 };
1686 struct
1687 {
1688 int r, g, b;
1689 };
1690 int v[3];
1691 };
1692
1693 ivec() {}
1694 explicit ivec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)), z(static_cast<int>(v.z)) {}
1695 ivec(int a, int b, int c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
1696 ivec(int d, int row, int col, int depth)
1697 {
1698 v[R[d]] = row;
1699 v[C[d]] = col;
1700 v[D[d]] = depth;
1701 }
1702 ivec(int i, const ivec &co, int size) : x(co.x+((i&1)>>0)*size), y(co.y+((i&2)>>1)*size), z(co.z +((i&4)>>2)*size) {}
1703 explicit ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z = 0);
1704 explicit ivec(const svec &v);
1705
1706 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1707 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1708
1709 //int idx(int i) { return v[i]; }
1710 bool operator==(const ivec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
1711 bool operator!=(const ivec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
1712 ivec operator+(const ivec &v) const { return ivec(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z); }
1713 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
1714 ivec &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; z<<= n; return *this; }
1715 ivec &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; z>>= n; return *this; }
1716 ivec &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; z *= n; return *this; }
1717 ivec &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; z /= n; return *this; }
1718 ivec &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; z += n; return *this; }
1719 ivec &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; z -= n; return *this; }
1720 ivec &mul(const ivec &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; z *= v.z; return *this; }
1721 ivec &div(const ivec &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; z /= v.z; return *this; }
1722 ivec &add(const ivec &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this; }
1723 ivec &sub(const ivec &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this; }
1724 ivec &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; z &= n; return *this; }
1725 ivec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1726 ivec &min(const ivec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
1727 ivec &max(const ivec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
1728 ivec &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); z = ::min(z, n); return *this; }
1729 ivec &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); z = ::max(z, n); return *this; }
1730 ivec &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); z = ::abs(z); return *this; }
1731 ivec &clamp(int l, int h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
1732 ivec &cross(const ivec &a, const ivec &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1733 int dot(const ivec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
1734 float dist(const plane &p) const;
1735
1736 static inline ivec floor(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::floor(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.z))); }
1737 static inline ivec ceil(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.z))); }
1738};
1739
1740inline vec::vec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1741
1742inline bool htcmp(const ivec &x, const ivec &y)
1743{
1744 return x == y;
1745}
1746
1747inline uint hthash(const ivec &k)
1748{
1749 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1750}
1751
1755struct ivec2
1756{
1757 union
1758 {
1759 struct { int x, y; };
1760 int v[2];
1761 };
1762
1763 ivec2() {}
1764 ivec2(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1765 explicit ivec2(const vec2 &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)) {}
1766 explicit ivec2(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1767
1768 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1769 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1770
1771 bool operator==(const ivec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
1772 bool operator!=(const ivec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
1773
1774 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
1775 ivec2 &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; return *this; }
1776 ivec2 &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; return *this; }
1777 ivec2 &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; return *this; }
1778 ivec2 &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; return *this; }
1779 ivec2 &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; return *this; }
1780 ivec2 &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; return *this; }
1781 ivec2 &mul(const ivec2 &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; return *this; }
1782 ivec2 &div(const ivec2 &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; return *this; }
1783 ivec2 &add(const ivec2 &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this; }
1784 ivec2 &sub(const ivec2 &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this; }
1785 ivec2 &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; return *this; }
1786 ivec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
1787 ivec2 &min(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
1788 ivec2 &max(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
1789 ivec2 &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); return *this; }
1790 ivec2 &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); return *this; }
1791 ivec2 &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); return *this; }
1792 int dot(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
1793 int cross(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
1794};

1803struct svec
1804{
1805 union
1806 {
1807 struct { short x, y, z; };
1808 short v[3];
1809 };
1810
1811 svec() {}
1812 svec(short x, short y, short z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
1813 explicit svec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1814
1815 short &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1816 short operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1817};

1825struct matrix4
1826{
1827 vec4<float> a, b, c, d;
1828
1829 template<class T, class U>
1830 T transformnormal(const U &in) const
1831 {
1832 T v;
1833 transformnormal(in, v);
1834 return v;
1835 }
1836
1837 template<class T, class U>
1838 T transform(const U &in) const
1839 {
1840 T v;
1841 transform(in, v);
1842 return v;
1843 }
1844
1845 template<class T>
1846 vec perspectivetransform(const T &in) const
1847 {
1848 vec4<float> v;
1849 transform(in, v);
1850 return vec(v).div(v.w);
1851 }
1852
1853 template<class T>
1854 void mult(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y)
1855 {
1856 a = T(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z).madd(x.d, y.a.w);
1857 b = T(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z).madd(x.d, y.b.w);
1858 c = T(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z).madd(x.d, y.c.w);
1859 d = T(x.a).mul(y.d.x).madd(x.b, y.d.y).madd(x.c, y.d.z).madd(x.d, y.d.w);
1860 }
1861
1862 matrix4();
1863 matrix4(const float *m);
1864 matrix4(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c = vec(0, 0, 1));

2043//generic two dimensional vector
2044template<class T>
2045struct GenericVec2
2046{
2047 T x,y;
2048
2049 GenericVec2() {}
2050 GenericVec2(T x, T y) : x(x), y(y) {}
2051 GenericVec2(const vec2 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
2052
2053 bool operator==(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y; }
2054 bool operator!=(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y; }
2055};
2056
2057//generic three dmensional vector
2058template<class T>
2059struct GenericVec3
2060{
2061 T x,y,z;
2062
2063 GenericVec3() {}
2064 GenericVec3(T x, T y, T z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
2065 GenericVec3(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
2066
2067 GenericVec3<T> operator+(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x+h.x, y+h.y,z+h.z); }
2068 GenericVec3<T> operator-(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x-h.x, y-h.y, z-h.z); }
2069
2070 //comparison
2071 bool operator==(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y && z == h.z; }
2072 bool operator!=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y || z != h.z; }
2073 bool operator>(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x > h.x && y > h.y && z > h.z; }
2074 bool operator<(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x < h.x && y < h.y && z < h.z; }
2075 bool operator>=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x >= h.x && y >= h.y && z >= h.z; }
2076 bool operator<=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x <= h.x && y <= h.y && z <= h.z; }
2077};

2084extern const vec2 sincos360[];
2095inline int mod360(int angle)
2096{
2097 if(angle < 0)
2098 {
2099 angle = 360 + (angle <= -360 ? angle%360 : angle);
2100 }
2101 else if(angle >= 360)
2102 {
2103 angle %= 360;
2104 }
2105 return angle;
2106}
2107
2115inline const vec2 &sincosmod360(int angle) { return sincos360[mod360(angle)]; }
2116
2126inline float cos360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].x; }
2127
2137inline float sin360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].y; }
2138
2148inline float tan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.y/sc.x; }
2149
2159inline float cotan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.x/sc.y; }
